channel.title: Report: Server got removed on Status Checker. Purchasing Sponsored Server
channel.description:
Hello, my server called MultiscapeOnline on Mopar's Server Status Checker got removed a while ago. I was purchasing a Sponsored Server and going to pay it tomorrow. I have 50 hours time to pay it. When i tried to re-add my server, it says it is waiting for verification.
Is there way to fix this, before i get blocked forever to purchase Sponsored Server.
- Multiscape

item.title: Report: Server got removed on Status Checker. Purchasing Sponsored Server
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Message MITB or post in the Sponsored server topic, stop fucking making these posts people. MITB made a topic for a reason learn how to use it.

Read full topic
item.source: Report: Server got removed on Status Checker. Purchasing Sponsored Server
